commitMessage:
feat: implement add video feature with YouTube URL parsing and validation

- Created YouTube URL parser with timestamp support
- Implemented AddVideoDialog component using shadcn/ui
- Integrated AddVideoDialog into Dashboard
- Added Toaster for notifications
- Updated useStorage hook to use the new parser
prBody:
This PR implements the Add Video feature as described in Phase 2. 

Key changes:
- Added a robust YouTube URL parser in `src/lib/youtube.ts` that handles standard, short, and embed URLs, as well as timestamps.
- Created `AddVideoDialog` component which allows users to add videos by URL with optional title. It validates the URL using Zod and redirects to the player upon success.
- Integrated the `AddVideoDialog` into the `Dashboard` page.
- Added `Toaster` from `sonner` to `App.tsx` for user feedback.
- Improved `useStorage` hook to utilize the new URL parser.
notes: The YouTube URL parser handles various formats including `youtu.be`, `youtube.com/watch`, and embed URLs, extracting both video ID and start time. The UI uses shadcn components and provides immediate feedback via toasts.
